data.title: FIRST Account Director, Paul Stephenson, Listed In C&IT ‘A-List’
data.meta_description: Paul Stephenson, Account Director at FIRST London, has been listed in C&IT’s A-List – celebrating the best agency talent aged 35 or under.
data.text:
Emma Wilson, Operations Director said “Since Paul joined the agency eight years ago, he has become an exceptional account director with a tireless determination to succeed. His infectious enthusiasm has been instrumental in his relationships with clients and colleagues alike.”

Mark Riches, Managing Director also said “He is a real asset to the business; passionate, committed, focused and a truly nice guy. He is a true brand ambassador, working professionally and effectively with all of his clients.”

In an exclusive interview for C&IT, Paul discussed the best event he has ever worked on, his most challenging moments, his dream event, and goals before reaching 40.

About FIRST

FIRST provides world-class event delivery, creative development and technical production for a wide range of clients and international brands. 180-plus employees are based out of offices in New York, London, Los Angeles, and Singapore. FIRST clients span many industries including financial services, aerospace, consumer electronics, technology, medical and healthcare, automotive, media, and the non-profit sector. Event Marketer Magazine listed FIRST among their “Top 100 Event Agencies” for 2013, 2014, 2015, and 2016 and one of 2015’s “Best Places to Work in Events”. We’ve also been recognized by Crain’s New York Business as one of the Top 100 “Best Places to Work in NYC” for 2013, 2014, and 2015.
